# GRAPHICS::SET_PARTICLE_FX_LOOPED_FAR_CLIP_DIST

## Summary
Sets the far clip distance of a previously started looped particle effect (set to -1.0 to disable)

## Parameters
* **PTFX_ID** ptfxId
* **FLOAT** farClipDist
